rooms.description: A Scandinavian inspired open-plan area merging the entrance hall with the living space, emphasizing natural light with large glass windows.
A spacious dining area designed to accommodate extended family gatherings, featuring minimalist Scandinavian design elements and natural wood finishes.
The master bedroom is designed with ample natural light and a quiet view. Vastu guidelines ensure the bed faces north-east.
A bedroom designed to provide privacy and comfort, utilizing light colors and ample storage.
Designed as a flexible space that can be used either for a guest or home office, adhering to minimalist Scandinavian aesthetics.
An open bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with a walk-in shower and modern fixtures, incorporating Vastu elements for well-being.

openings.location: Connecting the living area and terrace

terrace.description: A Scandinavian styled rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, featuring seating areas and natural stone finishes.
